DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients HER2negative inoperable recurrent breast cancer . Exclusion criterion : Patients highgrade bone marrow depression ( absolute neutrophil count le 1,000 /mm^3 , absolute platelet count le 75,000 /mm^3 ) . Patients history hypersensitivity ingredient HALAVEN . Women pregnant may pregnant . Patients history use HALAVEN .
